tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: #DYK, Navy Hill, home to #FSI’s Office of the Historian, was formerly an observatory in the 1800s & a Navy hospital in the…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: #DYK, Navy Hill, home to #FSI’s Office of the Historian, was formerly an observatory in the 1800s & a Navy hospital in the 1900s? Understanding our diplomatic past is critical to our current training. Learn more about @HistoryAtState: bit.ly/3A7w7nJ. #FlashbackFriday
